summary: Adds a craftable Steel Heater Shield.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#e06666][size=4]Heater Shield Redone[/size][/color][/center]Adds a craftable, standalone Steel Heater Shield.

[size=3]Requirements:[/size]
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm

[size=3]Compatibility:
[/size]Should be compatible with everything.
Was made to work with the following mods;
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34093]WAFR[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49791]CCOR[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286]SkyRe[/url]
PerMa
Virtual [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23390]SPIKE[/url]


[size=3]Credits:[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/487647]Abakus[/url] for the original mod, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5916]A Steel Heater Shield[/url].
Kathonica for bringing the mod to my attention.
author: Raulfin
